channel.title: Misc on coflblog
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on coflblog

item.title: Back at it
item.description:
So… I dusted off the old programs and migrated to a new computer. I’ve got an few ideas sitting around for my next conlang after a few months on hiatus, and this one’s got exactly the same name as the last one: Saan.

Sadly, I managed to get myself stuck on the phonology— I know I want palatal stops, but not much else beyond that, especially in the area of vowels. Syntax-wise, the sole example sentence I crafted tends either to VSO like the last attempt I took at making a language, or if analyzed differently, SVO with zero copula. I’ll see what I can do there.

After I do some more thinking, I’ll throw up another post. Keep an eye out for it!

item.title: about
item.description: cofl is an average joe; not much beyond that. His .nanorc highlights all ⟨t⟩s in purple. He does different coding and conlanging stuff. That is all.
